amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Ground-Based Midcourse Defense Program by $107 million and to apply the savings to the Spending Reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in House Report 113-170 to strike $107,000,000 for 14 Ground-based Interceptors and reduces the deficit by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 141 - 272 (Roll no. 381).
